description: Manage Azure Network Virtual Appliance Site.

commands.name: az network virtual-appliance site create
commands.summary: Create an Azure network virtual appliance site.
commands.syntax:
az network virtual-appliance site create --appliance-name
                                         --name
                                         --resource-group
                                         [--address-prefix]
                                         [--allow {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                         [--default {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                         [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                         [--optimize {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
examples: az network virtual-appliance site create -n MyName -g MyRG --appliance-name MyAppliance --address-prefix 10.0.0.0/24 --allow --default --optimize

commands.name: az network virtual-appliance site delete
commands.summary: Delete an Azure network virtual appliance site.
commands.syntax:
az network virtual-appliance site delete [--appliance-name]
                                         [--ids]
                                         [--name]
                                         [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                         [--resource-group]
                                         [--subscription]
                                         [--yes]
examples: az network virtual-appliance site delete -n MySite -g MyRG --appliance-name MyName -y

commands.name: az network virtual-appliance site list
commands.summary: List all Azure network virtual appliance site.
examples: az network virtual-appliance site list -g MyRG --appliance-name MyName

commands.name: az network virtual-appliance site show
commands.summary: Show the detail of an Azure network virtual appliance site.
examples: az network virtual-appliance site show -n MySite -g MyRG --appliance-name MyName

commands.name: az network virtual-appliance site update
commands.summary: Update an Azure network virtual appliance site.
commands.syntax:
az network virtual-appliance site update [--add]
                                         [--address-prefix]
                                         [--allow {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                         [--appliance-name]
                                         [--default {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                         [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                         [--ids]
                                         [--name]
                                         [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                         [--optimize {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                         [--remove]
                                         [--resource-group]
                                         [--set]
                                         [--subscription]
examples: az network virtual-appliance site update -n MyName -g MyRG --appliance-name MyAppliance --address-prefix 10.0.0.0/24 --allow false --default false --optimize false

commands.name: az network virtual-appliance site wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
